name: Passenger Train
description: Bonus Mission on Carpathian Mountains which takes place on a Passenger Train

english.ui_starting_location_lynx_seats_desc: 47 has boarded the train and has taken a seat at the back of the train.
english.ui_starting_location_lynx_bar_desc: 47 has boarded the train and is having a drink at the bar.
english.ui_starting_location_lynx_office_desc: 47 has boarded the train and made his way to the office.
english.ui_agencypickup_lynx_laundryroom_desc: A contact can stash a briefcase containing a large item in the laundry carriage.
english.ui_agencypickup_lynx_janitorroom_desc: A contact can stash a small item in the maintenance room, located in the third carriage.
english.UI_LYNX_OBJ_DESC: Retrieve the Interpol Agent's USB drive
english.UI_LYNX_TARGET_OBJ_STASH: OR: Stash The Buyer in Container Marked 'X' for Capture
english.UI_LYNX_TARGET_DESC: Eliminate The Buyer OR Leave Them In A Container Marked 'X' For Capture
english.UI_LYNX_TARGET_LONGDESC:
Our client wants the Milford Industries fixer dealt with one way or another. Killing them would do the trick, but a bonus will come our way if the target is left unconscious in a container with an 'X' post-it note on it for a team to extract and interrogate

Our client doesn't have any clue what the buyer looks like, but I suspect if you can track down the Interpol agent meeting with them there'll be some information to work with. Also, expect them to be using some sort of untraceable payment for the exchange.
english.UI_CONTRACT_LYNX_BRIEFING:
Hello, 47 

Our client is a high profile European transport company in rivalry with Milford Industries. A Milford fixer is doing a deal with a dirty Interpol agent for all the information they've uncovered about Milford's shady practices. This cannot be allowed to happen. Secure the Interpol agent's data and deal with the corporate fixer.

Killing the buyer would get the job done, but our client would be willing to pay more if you can leave the target unconscious in a container their contact has marked 'X' with a post-it note for extraction and interrogation when the train reaches its destination.

I'm afraid we have no information on the target's appearance, but it's a good bet the Interpol agent has that information.

Good luck on this one, 47
english.desciption_usb: This USB device contains some sort of sensitive information. What exactly? Who knows.
english.UI_LYNX_LAPTOP_CLUE: This laptop mentions an exchange that's to take place and includes a picture of the buyer they're meeting with
english.UI_CHALLENGES_GENERAL_SILENT_ASSASSIN_SU: • Complete the mission.• Do not eliminate non-targets.• No bodies found.• Do not get spotted.• Do it all in your suit.
english.UI_CHALLENGES_GENERAL_SUIT_ONLY_DESC: • Complete the mission.• Do it all in your suit.
english.UI_CHALLENGES_GENERAL_SILENT_ASSASSIN_DE: • Complete the mission.• Do not eliminate non-targets.• No bodies found.• Do not get spotted.
english.UI_CHALLENGES_LYNX_PACIFIST_DESC: • Complete the mission.• Do not kill anyone.
english.UI_CHALLENGES_LYNX_CLUELESS_DESC: Neutralise the target without finding the Interpol agent's clue
english.UI_CHALLENGES_LYNX_DIAMONDS_DESC: Complete the mission with the target's payment

french.ui_starting_location_lynx_seats_desc: 47 has boarded the train and has taken a seat at the back of the train.
french.ui_starting_location_lynx_bar_desc: 47 has boarded the train and is having a drink at the bar.
french.ui_starting_location_lynx_office_desc: 47 has boarded the train and made his way to the office.
french.ui_agencypickup_lynx_laundryroom_desc: A contact can stash a briefcase containing a large item in the laundry carriage.
french.ui_agencypickup_lynx_janitorroom_desc: A contact can stash a small item in the maintenance room, located in the third carriage.
french.UI_LYNX_OBJ_DESC: Récupérer la clé USB de l'agent d'Interpol
french.UI_LYNX_TARGET_OBJ_STASH: OU: Laissez le dans un conteneur marqué par un 'X' pour capture
french.UI_LYNX_TARGET_DESC:
Eliminer l'acheteur
ou
Laissez le dans un conteneur marqué par un 'X' pour capture
french.UI_LYNX_TARGET_LONGDESC:
Notre client souhaite que l'on s'occupe du médiateur de Milford Industries d'une manière ou d'une autre. Les tuer ferait l'affaire, mais un bonus nous sera accordé si la cible est laissée inconsciente dans un conteneur avec un post-it 'X' dessus pour qu'une équipe puisse l'extraire et l'interroger

Notre client n'a pas aucune idée de l'apparence de l'acheteur, mais je suppose que si vous parvenez à retrouver l'agent d'Interpol qui les a rencontrés, vous aurez des informations sur lesquelles travailler. Attendez-vous également à ce qu’ils utilisent une sorte de paiement intraçable pour l’échange.
french.UI_CONTRACT_LYNX_BRIEFING:
Bonjour, 47 

Notre client est une entreprise de transport européenne de premier plan en rivalité avec Milford Industries. Un médiateur de Milford conclut un accord avec un agent corrompu d'Interpol pour toutes les informations qu'il a découvertes sur les pratiques louches de Milford. Cela ne peut pas se produire. Sécurisez les données de l'agent d'Interpol et occupez-vous du médiateur de l'entreprise.

Tuer l'acheteur serait suffisant, mais notre client serait prêt à payer plus si vous pouvez laisser la cible inconsciente dans un conteneur que son contact a marqué 'X' avec un post-it pour extraction et interrogation lorsque le train aura atteint sa destination.

Je crains que nous n'ayons aucune information sur l'apparence de la cible, mais il y a fort à parier que l'agent d'Interpol a cette information.

Bonne chance, 47
french.desciption_usb: La clé USB contient des informations sensibles. Lesquelles ? Qui sait.
french.UI_LYNX_LAPTOP_CLUE: L'ordinateur portable mentionne un échange qui aurait lieu et inclut une photo de l'informateur qu'ils vont rencontrer
french.UI_CHALLENGES_GENERAL_SILENT_ASSASSIN_SU: • Complete the mission.• Do not eliminate non-targets.• No bodies found.• Do not get spotted.• Do it all in your suit.
french.UI_CHALLENGES_GENERAL_SUIT_ONLY_DESC: • Complete the mission.• Do it all in your suit.
french.UI_CHALLENGES_GENERAL_SILENT_ASSASSIN_DE: • Complete the mission.• Do not eliminate non-targets.• No bodies found.• Do not get spotted.
french.UI_CHALLENGES_LYNX_PACIFIST_DESC: • Complete the mission.• Do not kill anyone.
french.UI_CHALLENGES_LYNX_CLUELESS_DESC: Neutralise the target without finding the Interpol agent's clue
french.UI_CHALLENGES_LYNX_DIAMONDS_DESC: Complete the mission with the target's payment

italian.ui_starting_location_lynx_seats_desc: 47 has boarded the train and has taken a seat at the back of the train.
italian.ui_starting_location_lynx_bar_desc: 47 has boarded the train and is having a drink at the bar.
italian.ui_starting_location_lynx_office_desc: 47 has boarded the train and made his way to the office.
italian.ui_agencypickup_lynx_laundryroom_desc: A contact can stash a briefcase containing a large item in the laundry carriage.
italian.ui_agencypickup_lynx_janitorroom_desc: A contact can stash a small item in the maintenance room, located in the third carriage.
italian.UI_LYNX_TARGET_OBJ_STASH: O: Lasciarli in un contenitore contrassegnato 'X' per l'acquisizione
italian.UI_LYNX_TARGET_DESC:
Eliminare l'acquirente 
o
 lasciarli in un contenitore contrassegnato 'X' per l'acquisizione
italian.UI_LYNX_TARGET_LONGDESC:
Il nostro cliente vuole che il risolutore delle Industrie Milford se ne occupi in un modo o nell'altro. Ucciderli farebbe il trucco, ma un bonus verrà da noi se il bersaglio viene lasciato incosciente in un contenitore con un post-it 'X' su di esso per una squadra per estrarre e interrogare 

 Il nostro cliente non ha idea di come sia l'acquirente, Ma sospetto che se riesci a rintracciare l'agente dell'Interpol che li incontra, ci saranno delle informazioni con cui lavorare. Inoltre, si aspettano che usino una sorta di pagamento non rintracciabile per lo scambio.
italian.UI_CONTRACT_LYNX_BRIEFING:
Ciao, 47 

 Il nostro cliente è una società di trasporto europea di alto profilo in rivalità con Milford Industries. Un faccendiere di Milford sta facendo un accordo con un agente dell'Interpol corrotto per tutte le informazioni che hanno scoperto sulle losche pratiche di Milford. Non possiamo permettere che accada. Proteggere i dati dell'agente dell'Interpol e trattare con l'azienda fixer.

Killing l'acquirente sarebbe ottenere il lavoro fatto, ma il nostro cliente sarebbe disposto a pagare di più se è possibile lasciare il bersaglio inconscio in un contenitore il loro contatto ha segnato 'X' con un post-nota per l'estrazione e l'interrogatorio quando il treno raggiunge la sua destinazione.

Temo che non abbiamo informazioni sull'aspetto dell'obiettivo, ma è una buona scommessa che l'agente dell'Interpol ha quelle informazioni.

Buona fortuna su questo, 47
italian.desciption_usb: Questo dispositivo USB contiene una sorta di informazioni sensibili. Cosa esattamente? Chissà.
italian.UI_LYNX_LAPTOP_CLUE: Questo portatile menziona uno scambio che avrà luogo e include una foto dell'informatore con cui si incontreranno
italian.UI_CHALLENGES_GENERAL_SILENT_ASSASSIN_SU: • Complete the mission.• Do not eliminate non-targets.• No bodies found.• Do not get spotted.• Do it all in your suit.
italian.UI_CHALLENGES_GENERAL_SUIT_ONLY_DESC: • Complete the mission.• Do it all in your suit.
italian.UI_CHALLENGES_GENERAL_SILENT_ASSASSIN_DE: • Complete the mission.• Do not eliminate non-targets.• No bodies found.• Do not get spotted.

german.ui_agencypickup_lynx_laundryroom_desc: A contact can stash a briefcase containing a large item in the laundry carriage.
german.ui_agencypickup_lynx_janitorroom_desc: A contact can stash a small item in the maintenance room, located in the third carriage.
german.UI_LYNX_TARGET_OBJ_STASH: ODER: Lassen Sie ihn in einem Behälter mit der Aufschrift 'X' für die Erfassung
german.UI_LYNX_TARGET_DESC:
Beseitigen Sie den Käufer 
oder
 lassen Sie ihn in einem Behälter mit der Aufschrift 'X' für die Erfassung
german.UI_LYNX_TARGET_LONGDESC:
Unser Kunde möchte, dass der Milford Industries Fixer auf die eine oder andere Weise behandelt wird. Sie zu töten würde den Trick tun, aber ein Bonus wird uns kommen, wenn das Ziel bewusstlos in einem Behälter mit einem 'X' Post-It-Notiz darauf gelassen wird, damit ein Team es extrahieren und befragen kann

. Unser Kunde hat keine Ahnung, wie der Käufer aussieht, Aber ich vermute, wenn Sie das Interpol-Agententreffen mit ihnen aufspüren können, gibt es einige Informationen, mit denen Sie arbeiten können. Erwarten Sie auch, dass sie eine Art unauffindbare Zahlung für den Austausch verwenden.
german.UI_CONTRACT_LYNX_BRIEFING:
Hallo, 47 Unser Kunde ist ein hochkarätiges europäisches Transportunternehmen im Wettbewerb mit Milford Industries. Ein Milford-Fixer macht einen Deal mit einem schmutzigen Interpol-Agenten für alle Informationen, die sie über Milfords zwielichtige Praktiken aufgedeckt haben. Dies kann nicht geschehen. Sichern Sie die Daten des Interpol-Agenten und kümmern Sie sich um den Unternehmensfixer. Killing der Käufer würde die Arbeit erledigt, aber unser Kunde wäre bereit, mehr zu zahlen, wenn Sie das Ziel bewusstlos in einem Container lassen können, deren Kontakt 'X' mit einem Post-It-Note für die Extraktion und Befragung markiert hat, wenn der Zug seinen Bestimmungsort erreicht.

 Ich fürchte, wir haben keine Informationen über das Aussehen des Ziels, aber es ist eine gute Wette, dass der Interpol-Agent diese Informationen hat.

 Gutes Glück auf dieser, 47
german.desciption_usb: Dieses USB-Gerät enthält eine Art von sensiblen Informationen. Was genau? Wer weiß.
german.UI_LYNX_LAPTOP_CLUE: Dieser Laptop erwähnt einen Austausch, der stattfinden soll, und enthält ein Bild des Informanten, mit dem sie sich treffen
german.UI_CHALLENGES_GENERAL_SILENT_ASSASSIN_SU: • Complete the mission.• Do not eliminate non-targets.• No bodies found.• Do not get spotted.• Do it all in your suit.
german.UI_CHALLENGES_GENERAL_SUIT_ONLY_DESC: • Complete the mission.• Do it all in your suit.
german.UI_CHALLENGES_GENERAL_SILENT_ASSASSIN_DE: • Complete the mission.• Do not eliminate non-targets.• No bodies found.• Do not get spotted.

spanish.ui_starting_location_lynx_seats_desc: 47 has boarded the train and has taken a seat at the back of the train.
spanish.ui_starting_location_lynx_bar_desc: 47 has boarded the train and is having a drink at the bar.
spanish.ui_starting_location_lynx_office_desc: 47 has boarded the train and made his way to the office.
spanish.ui_agencypickup_lynx_laundryroom_desc: A contact can stash a briefcase containing a large item in the laundry carriage.
spanish.ui_agencypickup_lynx_janitorroom_desc: A contact can stash a small item in the maintenance room, located in the third carriage.
spanish.UI_LYNX_OBJ_DESC: Recuperar la unidad USB del agente de Interpol
spanish.UI_LYNX_TARGET_OBJ_STASH: O: Déjelos en un contenedor marcado con 'X' para su captura
spanish.UI_LYNX_TARGET_DESC:
Eliminar al comprador
o
Déjelos en un contenedor marcado con 'X' para su captura
spanish.UI_LYNX_TARGET_LONGDESC:
Nuestro cliente quiere que el reparador de Milford Industries se resuelva de una forma u otra. Matarlos sería suficiente, pero obtendremos una bonificación si el objetivo queda inconsciente en un contenedor con una nota adhesiva con una 'X' para que un equipo la extraiga e interrogue.

Nuestro cliente no tiene idea de cómo es el comprador, pero sospecho que si puede localizar al agente de Interpol que se reunió con ellos, habrá alguna información con la que trabajar. Además, espere que utilicen algún tipo de pago imposible de rastrear para el intercambio.
spanish.UI_CONTRACT_LYNX_BRIEFING:
Hola, 47

Nuestro cliente es una empresa de transporte europea de alto perfil que rivaliza con Milford Industries. Un intermediario de Milford está haciendo un trato con un sucio agente de Interpol para obtener toda la información que han descubierto sobre las prácticas turbias de Milford. No se puede permitir que esto ocurra. Asegure los datos del agente de Interpol y trate con el reparador corporativo.

Matar al comprador haría el trabajo, pero nuestro cliente estaría dispuesto a pagar más si puede dejar al objetivo inconsciente en un contenedor que su contacto ha marcado con una 'X' con una nota adhesiva para su extracción e interrogatorio cuando el tren llegue a su destino. destino.

Me temo que no tenemos información sobre la apariencia del objetivo, pero es muy probable que el agente de Interpol tenga esa información.
Buena suerte con esto, 47.
spanish.desciption_usb: Este dispositivo USB contiene algún tipo de información confidencial. ¿Qué exactamente? Quién sabe.
spanish.UI_LYNX_LAPTOP_CLUE: Esta computadora portátil menciona un intercambio que se llevará a cabo e incluye una foto del comprador con el que se reunirán.
spanish.UI_CHALLENGES_GENERAL_SILENT_ASSASSIN_SU: • Complete the mission.• Do not eliminate non-targets.• No bodies found.• Do not get spotted.• Do it all in your suit.
spanish.UI_CHALLENGES_GENERAL_SUIT_ONLY_DESC: • Complete the mission.• Do it all in your suit.
spanish.UI_CHALLENGES_GENERAL_SILENT_ASSASSIN_DE: • Complete the mission.• Do not eliminate non-targets.• No bodies found.• Do not get spotted.
spanish.UI_CHALLENGES_LYNX_PACIFIST_DESC: • Complete the mission.• Do not kill anyone.
spanish.UI_CHALLENGES_LYNX_CLUELESS_DESC: Neutralise the target without finding the Interpol agent's clue
spanish.UI_CHALLENGES_LYNX_DIAMONDS_DESC: Complete the mission with the target's payment

russian.ui_starting_location_lynx_seats_desc: 47-й сел на поезд и занял место в задней части поезда.
russian.ui_starting_location_lynx_bar_desc: 47-й сел на поезд и отдыхает в баре.
russian.ui_starting_location_lynx_office_desc: 47-й сел на поезд и добрался до офиса.
russian.ui_agencypickup_lynx_laundryroom_desc: Наш человек может спрятать кейс содержащий крупный предмет в вагоне-прачечной.
russian.ui_agencypickup_lynx_janitorroom_desc: Наш человек может спрятать небольшой предмет в комнате техобслуживания, расположенной в третьем вагоне.
russian.UI_LYNX_TARGET_DESC:
Устраните Покупателя
или
Спрячьте его в хранилище отмеченном знаком 'X' для последующего захвата
russian.UI_LYNX_TARGET_LONGDESC:
Наш клиент желает избавиться от посредника компании Милфорд Индастриз тем или иным путём. Устранение будет удовлетворительным вариантом, но клиент обещал нам дополнительную награду если цель будет нейтрализована и спрятана в неком хранилище помеченном запиской со знаком 'X', откуда её позже подберет особая команда для дальнейшего допроса

Нашему клиенту неизвестно как выглядит покупатель, но я подозреваю что если вы сможете выследить агента Интерпола, у которого с целью назначена встреча, то сможете раздобыть ценную для нас информацию. Также будьте готовы к тому что в качестве оплаты при обмене будет использоваться что-то плохо поддающееся отслеживанию.
russian.UI_CONTRACT_LYNX_BRIEFING:
Здравствуйте, 47 

Наш клиент - высокопрофильная Европейская транспортная компания, чьей главной соперницей являтся Милфорд Индастриз. Как стало известно, посредник компании Милфорд проводит сделку с продажным агентом Интерпола в обмен на информацию которую им удалось нарыть на все тёмные делишки компании. Этому нельзя позволить случиться. Заполучите данные агента Интерпола, и разберитесь с посредником корпорации.

Достаточно будет устранить посредника, но наш клиент также готов заплатить больше, если вы спрячете оглушённую цель в хранилище отмеченном запиской со знаком 'X', для последующего захвата и допроса, когда поезд прибудет к станции.

Боюсь у нас нет информации о том как именно будет выглядеть цель, но высока вероятность того, что это известно агенту Интерпола.

Удачи вам, 47
russian.desciption_usb: На этой флешке содержится некая ценная информация. Какая именно? Кто знает...
russian.UI_LYNX_LAPTOP_CLUE: На этом ноутбуке указаны детали планируемой встречи, а также приложена фотография информатора с которым она будет проходить
russian.UI_CHALLENGES_GENERAL_SILENT_ASSASSIN_SU: • Выполните задание.• Устраняйте только цели.• Тела не должны быть обнаружены.• Оставайтесь незамеченным.• Используйте только свой костюм.
russian.UI_CHALLENGES_GENERAL_SUIT_ONLY_DESC: • Выполните задание.• Используйте только свой костюм.
russian.UI_CHALLENGES_GENERAL_SILENT_ASSASSIN_DE: • Выполните задание.• Устраняйте только цели.• Тела не должны быть обнаружены.• Оставайтесь незамеченным.
russian.UI_CHALLENGES_LYNX_CLUELESS_DESC: Нейтрализуйте цель не обнаруживая данные агента Интерпола
russian.UI_CHALLENGES_LYNX_DIAMONDS_DESC: Выполните задание забрав при этом оплату цели

Leave Them In A Container Marked 'X' For Capture
chineseTraditional.UI_LYNX_TARGET_LONGDESC:
Our client wants the Milford Industries fixer dealt with one way or another. Killing them would do the trick, but a bonus will come our way if the target is left unconscious in a container with an 'X' post-it note on it for a team to extract and interrogate

Our client doesn't have any clue what the buyer looks like, but I suspect if you can track down the Interpol agent meeting with them there'll be some information to work with. Also, expect them to be using some sort of untraceable payment for the exchange.
chineseTraditional.UI_CONTRACT_LYNX_BRIEFING:
Hello, 47 

Our client is a high profile European transport company in rivalry with Milford Industries. A Milford fixer is doing a deal with a dirty Interpol agent for all the information they've uncovered about Milford's shady practices. This cannot be allowed to happen. Secure the Interpol agent's data and deal with the corporate fixer.

Killing the buyer would get the job done, but our client would be willing to pay more if you can leave the target unconscious in a container their contact has marked 'X' with a post-it note for extraction and interrogation when the train reaches its destination.

I'm afraid we have no information on the target's appearance, but it's a good bet the Interpol agent has that information.

Good luck on this one, 47
chineseTraditional.desciption_usb: This USB device contains some sort of sensitive information. What exactly? Who knows.
chineseTraditional.UI_LYNX_LAPTOP_CLUE: This laptop mentions an exchange that's to take place and includes a picture of the buyer they're meeting with
chineseTraditional.UI_CHALLENGES_GENERAL_SILENT_ASSASSIN_SU: • Complete the mission.• Do not eliminate non-targets.• No bodies found.• Do not get spotted.• Do it all in your suit.
chineseTraditional.UI_CHALLENGES_GENERAL_SUIT_ONLY_DESC: • Complete the mission.• Do it all in your suit.
chineseTraditional.UI_CHALLENGES_GENERAL_SILENT_ASSASSIN_DE: • Complete the mission.• Do not eliminate non-targets.• No bodies found.• Do not get spotted.
chineseTraditional.UI_CHALLENGES_LYNX_PACIFIST_DESC: • Complete the mission.• Do not kill anyone.
chineseTraditional.UI_CHALLENGES_LYNX_CLUELESS_DESC: Neutralise the target without finding the Interpol agent's clue
chineseTraditional.UI_CHALLENGES_LYNX_DIAMONDS_DESC: Complete the mission with the target's payment

japanese.ui_starting_location_lynx_seats_desc: 47 has boarded the train and has taken a seat at the back of the train.
japanese.ui_starting_location_lynx_bar_desc: 47 has boarded the train and is having a drink at the bar.
japanese.ui_starting_location_lynx_office_desc: 47 has boarded the train and made his way to the office.
japanese.ui_agencypickup_lynx_laundryroom_desc: A contact can stash a briefcase containing a large item in the laundry carriage.
japanese.ui_agencypickup_lynx_janitorroom_desc: A contact can stash a small item in the maintenance room, located in the third carriage.
japanese.UI_LYNX_TARGET_OBJ_STASH: または: 購入者をコンテナに隠し、捕獲用に「X」マークを付ける
japanese.UI_LYNX_OBJ_DESC: インターポール捜査官のフラッシュドライブを回収する
japanese.UI_LYNX_TARGET_DESC:
買い手を排除する
または
捕獲用に「X」マークの付いたコンテナに入れておきます
japanese.UI_LYNX_TARGET_LONGDESC:
私たちのクライアントは、ミルフォード・インダストリーズのフィクサーを何らかの方法で対処したいと考えています。彼らを殺せばうまくいきますが、チームが抽出して尋問できるように、ターゲットが「X」のポストイットが書かれたコンテナの中で意識を失ったままにしておけば、ボーナスが得られます。

私たちのクライアントは、購入者がどのような人物なのかまったく知りませんが、インターポールの職員と面会しているところを追跡できれば、何らかの情報が得られるのではないかと思います。また、交換には追跡不可能な支払いが使用されることが予想されます。
japanese.UI_CONTRACT_LYNX_BRIEFING:
こんにちは、47

私たちのクライアントは、ミルフォード・インダストリーズとライバル関係にある有名なヨーロッパの運送会社です。ミルフォードのフィクサーは、ミルフォードのいかがわしい行為について暴露したすべての情報を求めて、汚いインターポールの捜査官と取引を行っている。このようなことが起こることは許されません。インターポール捜査官のデータを保護し、企業フィクサーに対処してください。

買い手を殺せば仕事は終わるが、ターゲットを意識を失ったコンテナの中に放っておいてくれるなら、クライアントはもっと金を払っても構わないと思うが、列車が到着した際に連絡先が抽出と尋問のためにポストイットで「X」とマークしておいた。行き先。

残念ながらターゲットの外見に関する情報はありませんが、インターポールの捜査官がその情報を持っているのは間違いありません。

頑張ってね、47
japanese.desciption_usb: このストレージ デバイスには、ある種の機密情報が含まれています。正確には？知るか
japanese.UI_LYNX_LAPTOP_CLUE: このノートパソコンには、これから行われる交換について言及されており、面会中の購入者の写真も含まれています。
